allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path ''hozio-dynamic-tags-optimized.zip'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $source = ''hozio-dynamic-tags-main''; $dest = ''hozio-dynamic-tags-optimized.zip''; $exclude = @\(''.claude''\); $files = Get-ChildItem -Path $source -Recurse | Where-Object { $relativePath = $_FullName.Substring\(\(Get-Item $source\).FullName.Length + 1\); -not \($exclude | Where-Object { $relativePath -like ""$_"" }\) }; Compress-Archive -Path \($files.FullName\) -DestinationPath $dest -Force")
